PageTitle: clock tod protocol (virtual access ap-id view)
FuncDef:
The clock tod protocol command configures the protocol type that the packets carrying TOD information abide by.
The undo clock tod protocol command deletes the protocol type that the packets carrying TOD information abide by.
By default, the protocol type is ubx.
CLIs: clock tod protocol { ubx | nmea | ccsa }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies ubx as the protocol type that the packets carrying TOD information abide by.
-

Specifies nmea as the protocol type that the packets carrying TOD information abide by.
-

Specifies ccsa as the protocol type that the packets carrying TOD information abide by.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Based on the signal type of an external BITS clock, you can run the clock tod protocol command to configure the protocol type that the packets carrying TOD information abide by.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
